author: Ric Bucher
title: The 2020 Draft Has NBA 'Guessing'
description: This year's NBA draft was already going to be a crapshoot, but now, without college basketball or European postseasons to scout and the league in shutdown, teams are guessing more than ever.
content:
NBA talent evaluators are like most people when it comes to a purchase: If it's between a shiny new model or a better-known older one, the freshly minted choice gets the nod.
"Not to be indelicate, but it's why people have affairs," one front-office executiv… [+14353 chars]
